availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: T. Jackson Conn (Clerk Jeff Co Court)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, court clerk. Kentucky native. Clerk of the Jefferson County Court in Louisville in 1860 and 1861.

ab.bibl: Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 60. Find A Grave, "T. Jack Conn (unknown-1872),:" Memorial# 135514413, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=135514413&ref=acom (accessed June 14, 2016).
